title: AI Environment & Dependency Conflicts
description: Resolve Python environment, library mismatch, and missing dependency errors.

steps.title: Isolate with Virtual Environments
steps.instruction: Always use 'python -m venv venv' or Conda. Never install AI libraries globally to avoid version conflicts.

steps.title: Verify Library Versions
steps.instruction: Run 'pip list' or 'conda list'. Check if versions of torch, torchvision, or tensorflow match the requirements.

steps.title: Reinstall Broken Dependencies
steps.instruction: Use 'pip install --force-reinstall <package_name>' to fix corrupted index or missing shared objects (.so/.dll).

steps.title: Check Compiler Dependencies
steps.instruction: Ensure 'Build Tools for Visual Studio' is installed if you are compiling custom CUDA kernels or installing C++ based libraries.

steps.title: Clean Pip/Conda Cache
steps.instruction: Run 'pip cache purge' or 'conda clean --all' to remove corrupted download files preventing fresh installs.
